Function: Complementary PWM Mode Synchronous Clear Disable*2 0: Enable synchronous counter clear by other channel other than the section of trough in complementary PWM mode 1: Disable synchronous counter clear by other channel other than the section of trough in complementary PWM mode
Mode Select*3 0 0 0 0: Saw-wave PWM mode 1(single buffer or double buffer possible) (omission)
